Name: Abyss-tainted
Effects: <Start of your turn> Gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: The Abyss Calls
Effects: After surviving any Trauma other than Obol, gain +1 @Danger

Name: Arabian Nights
Effects: Treat all your {Overbreak X} keywords as the upgrade Cycle 4+ version

Name: Ascend!
Effects: Each time you survive a Trauma Draw, place 1 generic token on your Titan Sheet. You gain the following stacking benefits depending on the number of generic tokens here: 1: +1 Precision. 2: +1 Speed. 3: Auto-break 1. 4: Stalwart. 5: Rocksteady. 6: +1 @Evasion. 7: +1 @Power. 8: +2 to Awakening rolls. 9: Immediately Awaken, @Adversary

Name: Carry the Weight
Effects: Each time you gain Midas tokens, place 1 Generic token on your Titan Sheet. You may discard an indicated number of those tokens to triger one of the folowing effects (as a free action, unless stated otherwise): 1: When performing a Hermes Move, treat it as 1 higher. 2: When you are about to suffer Float, ignore it. 3: Discard a Condition card. 4: When performing a Power Roll, gain +1 @Power. 5: Gain a @MovementAction. 6: Remove a Curse Affliction. 7: Awaken

Name: Cheat Fate
Effects: When you are about to draw an Obol, you may choose to draw a You Live! or You Died Obol instead (once per Battle). If you do, next time you draw an Obol, you must draw the other one

Name: Cold Open
Effects: When you attack, if there are no Opening or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool, place 1 Opening and 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Cyclopean Might
Effects: You can use @ThreeHanded Weapons as if they were @TwoHanded Weapons

Name: Dance of Fate
Effects: When you are about to draw an Obol, you may gain +2 @Fate to add 1 You live! Obol card to the Obol deck (for this draw only)

Name: Disturbance in Fate
Effects: Each time you roll a Crit Miss, @Adversary

Name: Djinnslayer
Effects: When on the Endless Staircase or on any Status card, gain +1 @Power

Name: Dual-Wielding
Effects: When attacking with a @OneHanded Weapon, you can add one stackable keyword of another equipped non-Perishable @OneHanded Weapon

Name: Elder Might
Effects: You can use @ThreeHanded Weapons as if they were @TwoHanded Weapons. If you don't use a @ThreeHanded Weapon, you have {Tireless}

Name: Fall and Soar
Effects: $Fate When you fail the Hold On test, immediately move 2 spaces instead of suffering the Falling Down effect. $Fate and {Knockdown} to Lifeline

Name: Fate Follows
Effects: Each time you roll a Crit Miss, @Adversary @Adversary

Name: Fearless
Effects: Immune to [Fear|AL0299] and [Dread|AL0299] Conditions. You cannot gain Despair tokens

Name: Fickle Fate
Effects: <Start of Battle> If you have less than 2 @Fate, raise @Fate to 2. If at any time you have 0 @Fate, you flash forward: remove the Titan from the Battle. Treat them as if they died. After surviving a Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Final Countdown
Effects: Each time you roll a Crit Miss, @Adversary @Adversary

Name: Finish Him
Effects: $Oxygen $Fate When attacking a BP card with a Death Blow Crit effect, gain a Crit Chance

Name: Fly
Effects: $Fate $Exhaust Use during voluntary movement to ignore all Terrain tiles during this movement. You cannot end your movement on an Obstacle or Chasm

Name: Forgotten Curse
Effects: Once per Battle, you may gain 3 Despair tokens to skip an After Attack of a Primordial Attack. You may use the ability only during a @WoO of an After Attack

Name: Four-Armed Centimanes
Effects: You have 4 Weapon @OneHanded slots. You cannot use @TwoHanded and @ThreeHanded Weapons

Name: Grey Alchemy
Effects: $Fate Turn 1 Midas or Pain token into 1 Ambrosia token

Name: In Light and Shade
Effects: Each Laser Attack hit and Sun Attack hit deals 1 @Danger less (to a minimum of 1). When you are about to die from incineration, draw an Obol instead

Name: Internalize Despair
Effects: <Start of your turn> Gain 1 Despair token

Name: Internalize Pain
Effects: <Start of your turn> Gain 1 Pain token

Name: Kreios Strain
Effects: While performing @MovementAction, you can move diagonally

Name: Last Titan Standing
Effects: If you are the last Titan on the Battle Board, you cannot gain Ambrosia tokens, Despair tokens, or suffer Knockdown

Name: Levitate
Effects: $Fate During voluntary movement, ignore an Obstacle or Chasm Terrain tiles. You can end your move on a Chasm but not on an Obstacle. If you start your turn on a Chasm, you must immediately use this ability, If you cannot, you die

Name: Lightweight Curse
Effects: You can use @ThreeHanded Weapons as if they were @TwoHanded Weapons. You cannot use @OneHanded Weapons

Name: Logicbreak
Effects: $Fate When you survive an Obol, perform a @CombatAction (up to 3 times per Round)

Name: Nimble Feet
Effects: You have 3 Weapon @OneHanded slots. You cannot use @ThreeHanded Weapons

Name: One for All
Effects: If your natural @Rage goes over 9 during an Attack, perform a normal Attack, but do not draw a BP card. Instead, perform a Power Roll, divide your Total Power by 2 (rounding up) and add +1 @Power if you had a Crit Chance. Note the resulting Power, then clear the Kratos Pool and continue to your second ability window (do not resolve any responses). Next time any Titan attacks, it adds the Power you noted to its Total Power

Name: One Small Step
Effects: When on a VP or the Endless Staircase, gain {Rocksteady}

Name: Pain Engine
Effects: Each time you gain a Pain token (each), place 1 Generic token on your Titan Sheet. You gain the following stacking benefits depending on the number of Generic tokens here: 1: +1 @Speed. 2: While performing @MovementAction, you can move diagonally. 3: Your Titan's Power die becomes @WhitePowerDie. 4: {Auto-rouse 1}. 5: {Deadly}

Name: Persian Deal
Effects: $Fate $Exhaust Turn 1 of your Midas tokens into 2 Ambrosia tokens, 1 Ambrosia into 2 Despair, or 1 Despair into 2 Midas

Name: Rage Summit
Effects: After surviving a positive Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, you may gain 1 @Rage. After Surviving a negative Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, you must gain 1 @Rage

Name: Ruse
Effects: After surviving a Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, place 1 Opening token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Seer Sense
Effects: After surviving a Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, gain 1 temporary positive @Evasion token

Name: Selenian Strain
Effects: <Start of Battle> Gain 1 Aether token

Name: Shadowdance
Effects: When you resolve a Primordial Attack against you, you may gain +X @Fate to perform @MovementAction and an Attack (treat it as an Interrupt, if able). Gain a @CombatAction Fatigue token. X is 3 minus the AI level

Name: Six-Armed
Effects: You have 3 @OneHanded slots OR 3 @Support slots

Name: Spartan-Bred
Effects: You ignore {The Strong Eat} Trait

Name: Spinning Tales
Effects: Before the Attack Roll, if the Kratos Pool is empty, activate all your applicable Kratos Table abilities that leave Kratos tokens. Do not leave any tokens during the second ability window from your Kratos Table abilities

Name: Stout
Effects: You have 3 @Support slots. You cannot have more than +1 @Evasion at any given time. Ignore up to -1 @Speed penalty from any 1 @Gear

Name: Stubborn
Effects: You may reduce suffered Pushbacks and Knockbacks by 1. Ignore Knockdown. After surviving a Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, lose -1 @Danger

Name: Surpass!
Effects: If you have 5+ @Rage, if your Weapon @Gear doesn't already have the Assist X keyword, it gains {Assist 1}

Name: Survive!
Effects: When you would die from an Instant Death effect, you may discard all generic tokens from your Titan sheet (at least 1) to perform an Obol Draw instead

Name: Tall Tales
Effects: After surviving a Major, Grave, or Obol Trauma, gain the @PriorityTarget token

Name: The Return
Effects: $Fate If you don't have a Time Anchor on the Board, remove another Titan's Time Anchor and place your own in its space. You can use this ability while [Time-clocked]

Name: The Truth
Effects: If R7 is marked, you have {Auto-hope 1}

Name: Theseus Logic
Effects: $Fate During voluntary movement, ignore an Obstacle or Chasm Terrain tile. You cannot end your move on an Obstacle or Chasm

Name: Unknown Might
Effects: You can use @ThreeHanded Weapons as if they were @TwoHanded. If you do, you have -1 @Support slot

Name: Wish Engine
Effects: Each time you survive a Wish Attack, place X Generic tokens on your Titan Sheet, where X is the level of the AI card. Each time you gain a [Wishkeen] or [Wishagog] Condition card, place respectively 1 or 2 Generic tokens on your Titan Sheet. You may discard an indicated number of those tokens to trigger one of the following effects (as a free action, unless stated otherwise): 1: When you attack, gain +1 Precision. 2: When you attack, gain {Auto-break 1}. 3: {Block 1}. 4: When performing a Power Roll, gain +1 @Power. 5: Gain @MovementAction. 6: Gain @CombatAction. 7: Awaken

Name: Wish Shield
Effects: Each Wish Attack and Laser Attack hit deals 1 @Danger less (to a minimum of 1) to you and adjacent Titans

Name: Born in the Dark
Effects: Immune to [Fear|AL0299] and [Dread|AL0299] Conditions cards and Despair

Name: Ur-Tainted
Effects: You do not provide any adjacency benefits to other Titans

Name: Fear is the Mind Killer
Effects: Each time you gain a [Fear|AL0299] Condition card, [Dread|AL0299] Condition card, or a Despair token (each), place 1 Generic token on your Titan Sheet. You gain the following stacking benefits depending on the number of Generic tokens here: 1: +1 Precision. 2: +1 @Speed. 3: {Defy 1}. 4: +1 @Power. If you would ever have 5+ Generic tokens, you immediately die

Name: Silver Strain
Effects: <Start of Battle> Gain 1 Oxygen token

Name: Aether Lamp
Effects: You have {Light X}, where X is the nymber of Aether tokens you have

Name: Electromagnetic Shield
Effects: Each Laser Attack hit and Microwave Attack hit deals 1 @Danger less (to a minimum of 1) to you and adjacent Titans

Name: Nimble Hands
Effects: You may use @ThreeOneHanded Weapons as if they were @TwoHanded

Name: To Dark We Will at Last Return
Effects: Each time you gain an Ambrosia token (each), place 1 Generic token on your Titan Sheet. You gain the following stacking benefits depending on the number of Generic tokens here: 1: +1 Precision. 2: {Stalwart}. 3: {Tireless}. 4: {Rocksteady}
